column5: Very nice clean and healthy looking brown. Must have been a great surprise. I don't think I have ever hit a trout on a lure yet. Thanks for sharing!

Went down to my local pike hole today, hoping to get some revenge from the big bite off I had last night. Tossing XRAPs for the toothy critters i get SLAMMED. After a strike like that I thought it had to be a big gator...then it started peelin drag...and more drag...and more drag? That is no pike thats for sure, but what the hell is it?!  Got my answer a few minutes later when it broke the surface in all her glory!    A Beautiful hen brown! ...in 8 FOW, with an XRAP. Thats a first for me!  Not the pike I was looking for but ill take it any day, also landed a 15 lb carp that decided to tangle with my X rap...probably not intentionally.  Thats all for today  kemper.
Nice fish!  It beats the heck out of a pike any day in my book.
That's sweet!  Congrats, kemper....
Nice dude....  always nice to get surprised!!
Nice looking fish!  Which Xrap were you using?
Beauty fish Congrats.
Nice fish !! Now where did that big gator get off too........
nice brownie!
thanks all, it was definatly one of the better fights that my bass rod has ever seen!
nice one kemper! You gotta love the suprise catches!
Nice job Kemper! I should have came down and joined you. So... how was the carp? are you hooked yet? lol
Great stuff!  That's an awesome catch for down there....must have been a very nice surprise!!
shoulda stuck that thing under a float and gone after mr. pike.  nice fish.
My thoughts exactly Raf... nice catch = nice pike bait! LOL HH
Wish that would happen more often!
Great Brown Kemper!  Love the surprises like that!
wow...that is awesome...fishing is full of surprises. I have yet to get a brookie under my belt...YET
Nice brown! just think you can eat it!
nice fish Kemper;..  When do i get MY surprise BROWN?
Powerpro, 30 lb.   The carp was large and smelly and wasted my pike fishing time. Fought like a wet log.  Just teasing...but carp really arent my thing
LOL...I've been fishing that exact same area for a year now and no surprise brown for me yet....
Cliff, lots of browns in there right now!  Saw one come out on a spinnerbait last night!

Hey kemper, I was the one who netted that beauty of a brown for ya. There are some nice gators down there and you will definitely see me more often. Give me a pm if you ever wanna hit the spot for the day or something.   -Fishnpro
Cool thanks again man...and you even slimed up the net with that fat carp!  Wondered if any of you guys would be on here. Youll see me around, probably heading down tomorrow night actually.
heres one caught while piking a couple years back.
